title: Divergent / Insurgent
description: The place is Chicago. The time, a dark future. Society is divided into five factions: Candor (the honest), Abnegation (the selfless), Dauntless (the brave), Amity (the peaceful) and Erudite (the intelligent). On the appointed day, every 16-year-old must choose where they belong, and undergo a grueling series of physical and psychological tests to earn their keep.Beatrice “Tris” Botley’s choice is about to change everything.…In the tradition of Suzanne Collins’ The Hunger Games comes Divergent and Insurgent—the first two volumes of Veronica Roth’s stunning dystopian trilogy, now available together in this exclusive 2-in-1 omnibus.In Divergent, the time has come for Beatrice to choose between the family she loves and the life she wants to lead. Her choice surprises everyone—but the secret she discovers during her grueling initiation is even more stunning.And in Insurgent, Tris is still reeling from the shocking events of her initiation day. As war rages around her, she must truly embrace who she really is—it’s her only hope to save the people she loves from destruction.This #1 New York Times bestselling series will leave you wondering: What choice would you make?
author: Veronica Roth
